about_the_game:
This OST includes the trailer and episode BGM from "BlazBlue Entropy Effect." It features 20 original game soundtracks that blend sci-fi electronic, Japanese rock, retro synthesizer, and more styles to provide a unique auditory experience.

Q: Where I can find the OST?

A: After you get the OST on the Steam, select "BlazBlue Entropy Effect - Soundtrack" in the Library and right-click it. Then select Manage and Browse local files. Finally, open the "BlazBlue Entropy Effect - Soundtrack B" folder to access the OST content.
